item.description:
Steppin Opportunity for TOSOB MEMBERS AND THEIR GUEST ONLY
STEPPIN FOR TOSOB 8 pm. 10 p.m. and 11:45

The United Minority Professionals have cordially invited The Original Steppers Of Boston to their Ebony Winter Gala

8pm -2am at the Boston Marriott Copley Place Hotel, 110 Huntington Ave, Boston

Cash Bar


Entertainment includes multiple rooms of music:
Chicago Style Steppin and Jazz in one room.
Other rooms offer Top 40, R&B, Old School, Hip-Hip, House and Caribbean.

Semi Formal attire dress code

The Original Steppers of Boston has partnered with U.M.P. , with a limited number of $50 discounted tickets available for sale

Parking Back Bay Garage $9 after 5 p.m.
Copley Place Garage $16

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Winter Ebony Gala 2010
